name: Space Expedition
description:
Space Expedition is an exciting oldschool platformer game with a colorful mixture of gameplay genres. This is a story of brave astronaut who is to discover what really happened on a distant space station.



Discover new locations, solve puzzles, evade the traps, fight monsters, operate machines and pilot spaceships in a good old pixel-art atmosphere! You'll have to be smart to complete quests, witty to escape danger, attentive to overcome obstacles and brave to fight the enemy in a open combat. The game for real heroes awaits you!

Get ready for the adventure, put on your space suit and charge your jetpack - the quest begins!

  • Atmospheric Exploration: Delve into a beautifully crafted, minimalistic world teeming with unique biomes, mesmerizing landscapes, and strange creatures that will ignite your sense of wonder and enthrall your senses.
  • Engaging Puzzles: Test your intellect and problem-solving skills as you interact with the environment, manipulate objects, and collaborate with the planet's native species to unlock new areas and progress through the game.
  • Intuitive PC Controls: Experience seamless gameplay with easy-to-use controls designed for PC, making navigating the alien world as enjoyable and immersive as possible.
  • Captivating Soundscapes: Immerse yourself in the rich audio experience of Space Expedition, featuring an original soundtrack and masterful sound design that perfectly complements the game's breathtaking visuals and engrossing atmosphere.
  • Mysterious Narrative: Unravel the enigmatic story of the alien planet as you delve deeper into its unknown territories. Discover hidden artifacts, ancient ruins, and cryptic messages that gradually reveal the world's secrets and your purpose within it.



Celebrating a Decade: Originally released 10 years ago, Space Expedition has captivated the hearts of countless players worldwide. Now, this beloved classic is available for FREE on Steam, allowing a new generation of adventurers to experience its enchanting charm.

Prepare to embark on an unforgettable adventure that transcends the boundaries of space and time. Unravel the enigma of the cosmos and explore the depths of an alien world filled with wonder and intrigue. Will you rise to the challenge and unlock the secrets of this mysterious realm?
